name: Intimate, Infinite
description:
Made for the "Series" pageant at www.makega.me
by Robert Yang (blog.radiator.debacle.us/ // @radiatoryang)


PRICE: Pay what you like, minimum $0 USD
Buy me a beer if you got anything out of it. Thanks.

**** OSX USERS: if you play this in full screen mode, make sure you run it in your *native resolution* or you might just get a black screen.

  • Making of / commentary: my (spoiler-filled) liner notes detail my intent and process... you should probably play it first. Part 1 is about the premise and frame narrative, part 2 is about the protagonist's race / gardening / chess.
